author: Noah Yoo
title: At the Drive-In Extend Tour
text:
At the Drive-In Extend Tour More spring shows from the reunited group At the Drive-In Photo by Andrew Benge/Redferns 
At the Drive-In are playing select live shows in North America this spring. The band previously announced dates for March, kicking off with a show at the 9:30 Club in Washington D.C. Now, they’ve added additional shows in New Orleans and Atlanta to their itinerary. At the Drive-In are also slated to perform at festivals in Europe in the summer. Check out their full tour dates below. The band’s first new song in 16 years, “ Governed by Contagions ,” was released in December. 
At the Drive-In: 
03-17 New Orleans, LA - Civic Theatre 03-18 Atlanta, GA - The Tabernacle 03-20 Washington, DC - 9:30 Club 03-22 New York, NY - Terminal 5 03-25 Boston, MA - House of Blues 03-27 Detroit, MI - The Fillmore Detroit 03-29 Toronto, Ontario - Rebel 08-16-19 Paredes de Coura, Portugal - Paredes de Coura Festival 08-25-27 Wetherby, England - Leeds Festival 08-25-27 Reading, England - Reading Festival 
Watch Omar Rodríguez-López’s “Running Away” video on Pitchfork.tv: Artists In This Story
